text: Livadh lake ( or ; , Štrbačko jezero or Ливадичко језеро, Livadičko jezero) is a mountain lake in the Shar Mountains in Kosovo. It lies at an elevation of above sea level and has a maximum length of and a maximum width of . It has a great depth for a mountain lake, with being the maximum depth. It is probably the most beautiful and popular lake in the entire Šar Mountains and is a big tourist attraction. Depending on season its surface can change from 1.3 to around 2 hectares. It is next to the Tumba Peak (Šar) and Maja Livadh peaks. == References == Category:Lakes of Kosovo Category:Šar Mountains
title: Livadh Lake
